Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObject
      • Unit
        • Player

  • public class Player
extends Unit
    The character which the user plays as.

        x - The Player's starting x location in pixels.
        y - The Player's starting y location in pixels.

      • update

        public void update(double dir_x,
                   double dir_y,
                   int delta,
                   World w,
                   boolean A_key,
                   boolean T_key)
            throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Moves the player around the map, taking into account checking map edges and terrain type.
        Parameters:
        dir_x - The x direction that the player is trying to move: -1 or 0 or 1.
        dir_y - The y direction that the player is trying to move: -1 or 0 or 1.
        delta - The number of milliseconds since the last frame.
        w - game world.
        A_key - True if the A key is being pressed.
        T_key - True if the T key is being pressed.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

      • backtovillage

        public void backtovillage()
        Back to village.
